# archestra_user_role_assignment (Resource)

Assigns a role to a user.

**⚠️ Backend API Limitation**: This resource is currently blocked because the backend does not expose user role assignment endpoints. The schema is defined and ready, but CRUD operations will fail with a clear error message until the backend APIs are available.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Assign a role to a user
# Note: This resource requires backend API support for user role management
resource "archestra_user_role_assignment" "example" {
  user_id = "user-123"
  role_id = archestra_role.data_scientist.id
}

# Multiple role assignments
resource "archestra_user_role_assignment" "admin_assignment" {
  user_id = "user-456"
  role_id = "admin-role-id"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `role_id` (String) The ID of the role to assign
- `user_id` (String) The ID of the user

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) User role assignment identifier
